definitions.text: give something useful or necessary to
examples: We provided the room with an electrical heater

definitions.text: give what is desired or needed, especially support, food or sustenance
examples: The hostess provided lunch for all the guests

definitions.text: determine (what is to happen in certain contingencies), especially by including a proviso condition or stipulation
examples: The will provides that each child should receive half of the money
The Constitution provides for the right to free speech

definitions.text: make a possibility or provide opportunity for; permit to be attainable or cause to remain
examples: This leaves no room for improvement
The evidence allows only one conclusion
leave lots of time for the trip
This procedure provides for lots of leeway

definitions.text: supply means of subsistence; earn a living
examples: He provides for his large family by working three jobs
Women nowadays not only take care of the household but also bring home the bacon
provide for the proper care of the passengers on the cruise ship
